column4: hello, i dont want to get updates to my kernel all the time. what other things are related to the "intrepid-proposed"?
Any software that has not undergone enough testing to allow its entry into the 'main' repositories.
so thats lots of stuff. any ideas how to just ignore kernel updates? they happen too fast for my liking, and i end up rebuilding a bunch of stuff every time.
Not really. If the package passes the testing period in -proposed, it will be moved to -updates
